objective_summary: The main research objective of Cantera et al. (2016) is to investigate the impact of high copper concentrations and enhanced methane transfer on microbial communities during enrichment, focusing on their role in methane biodegradation. The study employs an experimental approach using enrichment cultivation conditions to develop microbial communities with high efficiency and robustness in methane abatement.
title: Cantera et al. 2016
